page.title: 03MOTORWAY CARAVAN SITE
page.content: I LIVE ON BALFOUR BEATTY SITE. THE SITE IS FOR THE FAMILES WORKING ON THE MOTORWAY CONSTRUCTION.THE SITE HAS ROUGH GROUNDS AND BEHIND MOST OF THE CARAVANS THERE IS GRASS.IT IS SMALL AND STONEY.LIVING IN A CARAVAN IS RATHER GOOD THEY ARE TIDY JUST LIKE A HOUSE.MOST CARAVANS HAVE GAS AND ELECTRICITY WHICH LETS YOU COOK.THE ONLY THING WRONG WITH LIVING IN A CARAVAN IS YOU CAN ONLY TAKE HOME MORE THAN TWO OF YOUR FRIENDS BECAUSE THERE IS NOT VERY MUCH SPACE.THE CARAVANS ARE NICE INSIDE THEY HAVE A KITCHEN, DINNING ROOM,BEDROOM AND A TOILET.I AM ON THE SITE BECAUSE MY STEPDAD IS WORKING ON THE SITE AND IF HE DID NOT TAKE THE JOB HERE IN SOUTH MIMMS HE WOULD NOT HAVE A JOB AT ALL.
